column4: I just ate mayo that hasn't been in a fridge for 8 hrs... What's gonna happen?
There is a childrens song that tells what's going to happen . . . "when you're slidin' into first & you feel something burst . . . . "  you know that song?  THAT's what's gonna happen!
No, no . . . suck is the wrong direction my friend . . . blow, this is going to blow . . . LOL.
